sources.title: Sight
sources.description: Title: Sight Summary: A short futuristic film featuring Augmented reality and Gamification. by Eran May-raz and Daniel Lazo. This is our graduation project from Bezaleal academy of arts. Directed by: Daniel Lazo, Eran May-Raz Actors: Production Company: Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design Release Date: 2012 (Israel) Aspect Ratio: REMOVE_TAG A short futuristic film featuring Augmented reality and Gamification. by Eran May-raz and Daniel Lazo. This is our graduation project from Bezaleal academy of arts.

metadata.Plot: A short futuristic film featuring Augmented reality and Gamification. by Eran May-raz and Daniel Lazo. This is our graduation project from Bezaleal academy of arts.
